Département Informatique (07/2023 - 08/2023) 📍 Banque de Tunisie, Tunis Découverte de l’environnement IT bancaire Gestion de réseaux et assistance technique Optimisation des processus administratifs 🚀 PROJETS ACADÉMIQUES Application IA pour les pêcheurs Développement d'une application mobile exploitant l’IA pour aider les pêcheurs à identifier les meilleures zones de pêche Implémentation de modèles prédictifs basés sur des données météorologiques et océanographiques 🎓 ÉDUCATION École supérieure privée d'ingénierie et de technologie | 2022-2027 📌 Spécialisation : Intelligence Artificielle Lycée Dachraoui, El Menzah 9 | 2018-2022 Baccalauréat en Sciences Mathématiques 🏅 HACKATHONS Certifications Hackathons AI & IA Générative : Recréation virtuelle d’un Fundamentals of Deep Learning NVIDIA | 2024 CERTIFICATIONS site archéologique Generative AI with diffusion models NVIDIA | Analyse de CVs : Développement d’un 2025 outil d’analyse automatique pour les recruteurs 💻 COMPÉTENCES Intelligence Artificielle & Machine Développement Web & Soft Skills Learning Programmation Résolution de Deep Learning avec TensorFlow & PyTorch Django, Flask (Python) problèmes Computer Vision (YOLO, OpenCV) HTML/CSS, PHP Travail en équipe Traitement du langage naturel (NLP) SQL, NoSQL Adaptabilité et Git/GitHub apprentissage rapide 🌍 LANGUES & Langues Centres d’intérêt CENTRES D’INTÉRÊT Arabe : Natif Natation (10 ans d’entraînement) Français : B2 (TCF – Institut Français de Tunis) Participation à des challenges IA Anglais : B2 (ESPRIT Language Center)

soft_skills: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
key_responsibilities: Design and implement secure cloud architectures
Monitor and analyze cloud security logs
Develop and maintain cloud security tools
Collaborate with DevOps teams to integrate security into CI/CD pipelines
Provide training and guidance on cloud security best practices

match_data.final_assessment: The candidate demonstrates a strong technical foundation in cloud security, with notable skills in AWS and Python. However, they lack hands-on experience with Ansible. Their domain expertise is aligned with the requirements, but they may require additional training to meet the seniority level's expectations. Overall, they show great potential as a Cloud Security Engineer.

email.subject: Interview Invitation for Cloud Security Engineer at Cybersecurity Solutions Inc.
email.body:

Thank you for your application for the Cloud Security Engineer position at Cybersecurity Solutions Inc. in New York, NY (Onsite). We have reviewed your qualifications and are impressed with your background.

We were particularly impressed with your AWS CloudFormation, Amazon S3 and Python 3.x.

We would like to schedule an interview with you to discuss your experience and the position in more detail. Please respond to this email with your availability in the next two weeks.

During the interview, we'll discuss your experience in more depth and share more about our team, projects, and company culture.

We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Best regards,
Cybersecurity Solutions Inc. Recruitment Team
